post.summary: List all users in a specific Slack channel.
post.description: Retrieves a list of all users in a specified Slack channel. It provides a detailed information about each user.

ai.systemPrompt: To get a list of users in a specific channel, provide the `channelId` (starts with 'C'). DO NOT ASSUME THE CHANNEL ID BY NAME. If the channelId is unknown, use `getChannelsIds` to get the paginated channelIds to names mapper and find the channelId by name from the output. If needed, paginate until the channelId is found using nextCursor in the response of the last try. DO NOT CALL THIS ON NEWLY CREATED CHANNELS which don't have any members yet.

body.description: Body of the getChannelMembers sls call

channelId.description: channelId: The ID of the channel to get the members of. Channel IDs start with 'C'.

schema.description: An array of user IDs who are members of the specified channel.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid channel ID or other client error

error.description: Error message describing the server error
